description: This file defines the interface for Ethernet switch utility functions, including initialization, configuration, status retrieval, and port management. It contains function declarations for interacting with Ethernet switch hardware, likely used in system or network management components.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_Init
methods.description: Initializes the Ethernet switch HAL stub layer.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_GetAdminPortStatus
methods.description: Retrieves the administrative port status for a given port ID.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_GetPortCfg
methods.description: Gets the current configuration (duplex mode, bitrate) for a specific port.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_GetPort_Status
methods.description: Gets link status, bitrate, and duplex mode for a port.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_LocatePort_By_MacAddress
methods.description: Locates port ID based on MAC address.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_SetPortCfg
methods.description: Sets configuration parameters for a port.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_SetPortAdminStatus
methods.description: Sets administrative status for a port.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_SetAgingSpeed
methods.description: Configures aging speed for the switch.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_Get_AssociatedDevice
methods.description: Retrieves devices associated with the switch.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_Get_EthWanInterfaceName
methods.description: Gets the Ethernet WAN interface name.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_Get_EthWanEnable
methods.description: Checks if Ethernet WAN is enabled.

methods.name: ssp_ethsw_stub_hal_Get_EthWanLinkStatus
methods.description: Gets the link status of the Ethernet WAN.
